Source code for maxairesources.logging.logger

import logging
import json
import os
from maxaimetadata.maxflow import MaxFlow

# gets process ID for current run, will be same for all the module log till the process dies
# allocated new in every run
_log_format = "{\"timestamp\":\"%(asctime)s\",\"pid\":\"%(process)d\",\"level\":\"%(levelname)s\",\"file_name\":\"%(filename)s\",\"hierarchy\":\"%(name)s\",\"function_name\":\"%(funcName)s\",\"line_number\":\"%(lineno)d\",\"message\":\"%(message)s"



[docs]class CustomAdapter(logging.LoggerAdapter):
    """
    Example 
    ```
    from maxairesources.logging.logger import get_logger #import function
    logger = get_logger(__name__) #get logger
    logger.debug(f"log this debug message") #log debug message
    ```
    """

[docs]    def process(self, msg, kwargs):
        try:
            mf = MaxFlow.get_active_flow()
            exp = mf.exp.name
            run = mf.run.info.run_id
        except:
            exp = 'NA'
            run = 'NA'
        my_context = kwargs.pop('extra', self.extra)
        return '%s\",\"extra\":%s, \"experiment\": \"%s\",\"run\": \"%s\"}' % (
            msg, json.dumps(my_context), exp, run), kwargs



[docs]def get_file_handler(level, filename="run_details.log"):
    """returns file handler for log"""
    file_handler = logging.FileHandler(filename)
    file_handler.setLevel(level)
    file_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(_log_format))
    return file_handler




[docs]def get_stream_handler(level):
    """get stream to show logs on terminal"""
    stream_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
    stream_handler.setLevel(level)
    stream_handler.setFormatter(logging.Formatter(_log_format))
    return stream_handler




[docs]def get_logger(name, level=logging.DEBUG):
    """returns logger as per filename / module name"""

    # get logger
    logger = logging.getLogger(name)
    logger.setLevel(level)

    # saves log to file
    logger.addHandler(get_file_handler(level))

    # show logs to std out / terminal
    logger.addHandler(get_stream_handler(level))
    
    logger = CustomAdapter(logger, None)

    return logger
